p.strong: Welcome to the Fort Ann School District

span.style: background-color: transparent; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: x-small; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);

address.span: The Fort Ann Central School District believes our highest priority is to ensure that all students succeed in learning. We believe in providing an engaging and innovative learning environment that emphasizes the development of our students to become productive members of a multifaceted, diverse, global society.

p.style: line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; font-family: Merriweather, serif; text-align: center;

span.style: background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10px; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);

div.div: The Fort Ann Central School District will be cancelling classes and school events for all students, starting Monday, March 16, through Friday, April 17, 2020.
READ MORE About District-Wide School Closure
Please view the following letter from Superintendent Froats.

As we look forward to hosting numerous community events this Spring, we have placed hand sanitizing stations near the entrances of our gyms, auditorium, and main entrance. All visitors are encouraged to sanitize before and after leaving the district.
READ MORE About Being Proactive About Respiratory Illnesses

a.title: Students Place in Local Skills USA Competition

img.alt: Students Place in Local Skills USA Competition

div.div: Students Place in Local Skills USA Competition
The SkillsUSA Championships are competitive events showcasing the best career and technical education students in the nation.
READ MORE About Students Place in Local Skills USA Competition
We always love when Bridge Arts Ensemble visits the district!
READ MORE About Bridge Arts Ensemble

Culinary Arts students, including our very own Judge Harrell and Gabrielle Tracy, prepared an amazing breakfast for area district superintendents and board members as they discussed priorities of the schools in our region.
READ MORE About WSWHE BOCES Legislative Breakfast
The Fort Ann Central School District is putting two surplus 2008 International CE 200 School Buses up for auction with Collar City Auctions.
READ MORE About Buses for Auction

a.title: Local Farm & Rotary Club Give $1000 to Backpack Program

img.alt: Local Farm & Rotary Club Give $1000 to Backpack Program

div.div: Local Farm & Rotary Club Give $1000 to Backpack Program
Fort Ann Rotary Club and Lavenlair Farm has donated $1,000 to Fort Ann Central School District’s Family Outreach Center’s Weekend Backpack Program!
READ MORE About Local Farm & Rotary Club Give $1000 to Backpack Program
Congratulations to all three Fall Varsity teams for receiving NYSPHAA Scholar Athlete recognition this season!
READ MORE About NYSPHAA Scholar-Athlete Awards

span.style: font-family: Tahoma; letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center;;color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: rgb(192, 0, 0);;font-size: 13px;

p.span: ALL CALENDAR EVENTS BETWEEN THE DATES OF MARCH 16, 2020, AND APRIL 19, 2020, HAVE BEEN POSTPONED OR CANCELED. MORE DETAILS TO COME.

span.style: background-color: transparent; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 6px; font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 33, 41);

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

div.class: kvgmc6g5 cxmmr5t8 oygrvhab hcukyx3x c1et5uql ii04i59q
div.style: overflow-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, system-ui, ".SFNSText-Regular", sans-serif; color: rgb(5, 5, 5); font-size: 15px; text-align: center;
div.div: Starting Monday, March 30, 2020, we will begin collecting food donations for our local food pantry! During these trying times, the food pantry is only open one day per month in Fort Ann and there is a concern that this may not meet the current demand. We will place two yellow wagons outside the school for staff and Fort Ann families to drop off food donations. This wonderful idea came from a parent and Mary Howerton, our cafeteria manager! After we begin collecting items, a table will be set up outside every day during school hours for families to take the collected food, as needed.
